control.name: Self-serve access enablement
control.description: Data products have self-serve policies and workflow(s) enabled to enable data consumers to self-serve in subscribing and managing subscriptions.

actionProperties.name: Missing access policy on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products without access policy
actionProperties.recommendation: Apply access policies for the data products.

control.name: Compliant data use
control.description: Data use purpose must be provided by data consumer when subscribing to a data product, and must be compliant with data use policies.

actionProperties.name: Missing terms of use on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products without terms of use
actionProperties.recommendation: Apply terms of use for the data products.

control.name: Access request SLA
control.description: Access requests for data products are addressed within published SLAs.

control.name: Zero-trust default access
control.description: Data products should by default only be accessible by their owners.

actionProperties.name: Data product not linked to data assets
actionProperties.reason: Data product not linked to data assets.
actionProperties.recommendation: Link assets to the data product.

actionProperties.name: Missing description on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products don't have description.
actionProperties.recommendation: Update description for data products.

actionProperties.name: Missing published glossary terms on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data product does not have published terms assigned
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign related terms to data products.

actionProperties.name: Missing use case on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products don't have use cases.
actionProperties.recommendation: Update use cases for data products.

actionProperties.name: Data product is not published.
actionProperties.reason: Data product is not published.
actionProperties.recommendation: Publish the data product.

control.name: Data products connection
control.description: Data assets are mapped to data products for discoverability in the catalog.

actionProperties.name: Data product not linked to data assets
actionProperties.reason: Data product not linked to data assets.
actionProperties.recommendation: Link assets to the data product.

actionProperties.name: Missing classification on data assets
actionProperties.reason: Missing classification on data assets.
actionProperties.recommendation: Go through classification process on data assets.

control.name: Critical data identification
control.description: Business critical data entities and attributes are defined for business domains.

actionProperties.name: Business domain without critical data entities
actionProperties.reason: No critical data entities under the business domain.
actionProperties.recommendation: Create critical data entities in the business domain.

control.name: Critical data connection
control.description: Business critical data entities are mapped to the data assets.

actionProperties.name: Critical data entities not linked to data assets
actionProperties.reason: Critical data entities are not linked to data assets.
actionProperties.recommendation: Link the critical data entities to the data assets.

control.name: Critical data cataloging
control.description: Business critical data entities are cataloged.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on critical data entities
actionProperties.reason: Critical data entities don't have owners assigned.
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners to critical data entities.

actionProperties.name: Missing description on critical data entities
actionProperties.reason: Critical data entities don't have description.
actionProperties.recommendation: Update description for critical data entities.

actionProperties.name: Missing published glossary terms on critical data entities
actionProperties.reason: Critical data entities don't have terms assigned.
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign related terms to critical data entities.

actionProperties.name: Missing classification on data assets related to critical data entities
actionProperties.reason: Data assets without classification that are part of critical data entities.
actionProperties.recommendation: Apply classifications for the data assets related to the critical data entities.

control.name: Business alignment
control.description: Physical data collections and platform domains in the data map are mapped to at least 1 business domain.

control.name: Data estate health monitoring, alerting, and insights
control.description: Observability for controls compliance across the data estate.

assessment.name: Data estate health monitoring, alerting, and insights

control.name: Business OKRs alignment
control.description: Data products serve 1 or more business OKRs.

actionProperties.name: Missing OKRs on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products with missing OKRs
actionProperties.recommendation: Link OKRs for the data products.

control.name: Operational costs
control.description: Operational costs are reported for business domains, data products, and data assets.

control.name: Business value
control.description: Business value outcomes from OKRs served are reported for data products.

control.name: Data product ownership
control.description: Data product and related assets have authorized owners.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products with missing owners
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the data products.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on data assets
actionProperties.reason: Data assets with missing owners that are part of data products
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the data assets related to the data product.

control.name: Data quality enablement
control.description: Data quality scoring is enabled for data products, and data assets, and is visible in the data catalog

actionProperties.name: Missing data quality scores on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products with missing data quality scores

actionProperties.name: Missing data quality scores on data assets
actionProperties.reason: Data assets with missing data quality scores that are part of data products
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign data quality rules for the data assets related to the data product.

control.name: Data product certification
control.description: Data products are certified by an authorized data product owner.

actionProperties.name: Data product is not endorsed
actionProperties.reason: Data product is not endorsed.
actionProperties.recommendation: Endorse the data products.

control.name: Data security and compliance
control.description: Data security and compliance policies are met by business domains, data products, and data assets.

actionProperties.name: Data product description length is less than 100 characters
actionProperties.reason: Data product description length is less than 100 characters.
actionProperties.recommendation: Enrich the data product description.

actionProperties.name: Business domain description length is less than 100 characters
actionProperties.reason: The description length of the business domain that data product belongs to is less than 100 characters.
actionProperties.recommendation: Enrich the description of the business domain.

actionProperties.name: Published glossary terms' description length is less than 25 characters
actionProperties.reason: The description length of the glossary terms that related to the data product is less than 25 characters.
actionProperties.recommendation: Enrich the description of the published glossary terms.

actionProperties.name: Data product description length is less than 100 characters
actionProperties.reason: Data product description length is less than 100 characters.
actionProperties.recommendation: Enrich the data product description.

actionProperties.name: Missing published glossary terms on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data product does not have published terms assigned
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign glossary terms to data products.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on data products
actionProperties.reason: Data products with missing owners
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the data products.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on data assets
actionProperties.reason: Data assets with missing owners that are part of data products
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the data assets related to the data product.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on glossary terms
actionProperties.reason: Glossary terms with missing owners that are part of data products
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the glossary terms related to the data product.

actionProperties.name: Missing owners on business domains
actionProperties.reason: business domains with missing owners that the data products belongs to.
actionProperties.recommendation: Assign owners for the business domains of the data product.

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality accuracy scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality accuracy scores

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality timeliness scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality timeliness scores

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality conformity scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality conformity scores

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality consistency scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality consistency scores

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality completeness scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality completeness scores

actionProperties.name: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality uniqueness scores
actionProperties.reason: Data product with lower than set threshold data quality uniqueness scores
